Plot: A look at four seasons in the lives of a happily married couple and their relationships with their family and friends.
Title: Another Year
Actors: Jim Broadbent, Ruth Sheen, Lesley Manville, Oliver Maltman
tomatoConsensus: Characterized by strong performances and the director's trademark feel for the nuances of everyday life, Another Year marks another solid entry in Mike Leigh's career of kitchen-sink English drama.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 20 wins & 52 nominations.
